message.body: Omg. I just bought a Sonicare
I mean a Clarisonic
I have a sonicare! Total game changer
I mean, why was I using anything else ever?
I dont have a sonicare yet :( need one. I got a Clarisonic though! So excited to try it out
Wait what is that?
Not a toothbrush?
ï¿¼I went a liiiiittle crazy in sephora today
No its a face cleanser
Ohhhhh people rave about those!
And I got this stuff called glamglow that is supposed to suck the shit right out of your pores
Tell me if it works! I just got some burts bees exfoliate it's great
(1/2) Ili is about to get tucked in. Then I am going to do a facial w my mario b stuff you got me. The girl said the enzyme cleanser you got me is great becaus
(2/2) e it isnt an exfoliator. You have to use a gel with the clarisonic. I will let you know!
Oh good! That stuff is really gentle and smells so good
I just crawled in to bed myself. Got up at 5
Yeah I really love it. That stuff makes my skin so soft. When I get low im going to order more
Dang why so early
So glad you like it! It is by far my favorite cleanser yet. I've been planning for class in the AM instead of the day before to keep myself from spending too much time overprepping
It's working well! Just have to go to bed early
Well have a good night!
You too!
